snippet.title: Robbie Swifthand - Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Release date:11th July 2019
Robbie Swifthand and the Orb of Mysteries is a 2D platformer consisted of mind intriguing. 
Psychology based level design, especially unique boss fights accompanied by groovy and mystifying music.
Plan ahead your every move and outsmart the traps that are lurking in the temple or get dissected in hilarious ways!
